channel.title: CRASH WHEN LOADING NEXT MAP
channel.description: I don't exactly know which map is giving me problems, but i remember it's after you solve the tram puzzles, after going all the way up with the tram, where here are 3 turrets waiting for you, when i continue down the tunnel and it begins loading a new map, the game crashes, black screen, and it says that "it stopped working", i tried doing it again 3 times, but the same happens, attached the crash file. help? hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_18T4_11_40C0.mdmp (78.1 KB)

item.title: CRASH WHEN LOADING NEXT MAP
item.dc:creator: Sadisto
item.description:
I don’t exactly know which map is giving me problems, but i remember it’s after you solve the tram puzzles, after going all the way up with the tram, where here are 3 turrets waiting for you, when i continue down the tunnel and it begins loading a new map, the game crashes, black screen, and it says that “it stopped working”, i tried doing it again 3 times, but the same happens, attached the crash file.
help?
hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_18T4_11_40C0.mdmp (78.1 KB)

Read full topic
